name: Tee Parham
bio:
I founded Neighborland with Candy Chang and Dan Parham. I am the lead engineer.

What if we knew what people wanted in their neighborhoods? That question was the genesis of Neighborland, and it continues to fascinate me. I believe that when residents have a simple way to make their neighborhoods better, amazing things will happen.

I love to build tools to make people more creative and productive. I want it to be easy and fun to make communities better.

When not programming computers, I enjoy snowboarding, tennis, urban cycling, and the tasty things, like a classic espresso or a Colorado craft beer.

Let's make our neighborhoods better. Share your ideas & make it happen!
